display_long_description:
Bus Parking VR: Bus Simulation Game delivers the most realistic and immersive bus driving experience in virtual reality. Designed for Meta Quest, this VR bus simulator puts you behind the wheel of multiple bus types including city buses, school buses, coach buses, mini-buses, articulated buses, and double-decker buses.

Use realistic steering controls, mirrors, door open, headlight, hazel light and reverse cameras to park with precision in tight, obstacle-filled environments. Master every bus control as you navigate through cones, barriers, narrow roads, and crowded bus stations.

Experience life-like bus physics while reversing, turning, and parking with accurate bus handling. Each level offers a new bus parking challenge—whether in a busy bus depot, narrow street, or tight city corner.

This VR bus game is made for fans of bus simulators, bus parking games, and realistic bus driving. Use different camera angles, fine-tune your bus steering, and unlock tougher bus missions as you improve.

With smooth VR controls, detailed 3D environments, and true-to-life bus features, this is the most complete and immersive bus parking simulator in VR.

Download now on the Meta Horizon Store and test your skills as a professional bus driver in the most challenging bus parking VR game yet!
